p2: Calculator untuk network subnet yang compute subnet mask, network range, broadcast address, dan usable host dari IP address. Input IP address dan CIDR notation atau subnet mask, dan tool menghasilkan network detail lengkap. Berguna untuk network engineer, sys admin, dan IT professional yang plan IP allocation dan network architecture. Support IPv4 dan IPv6.
p3: Network administrator menggunakan subnet calculator untuk plan IP addressing scheme jaringan perusahaan. IT consultant menggunakan untuk design network segmentation dan security. Telecom engineer menggunakan untuk manage IP allocation large network. Student network engineering menggunakan untuk learn networking concept dan CIDR notation.
p4: Subnet mask determine berapa many host dapat exist pada network: lebih tinggi CIDR number artinya lebih kecil network dan lebih few host. Reserved address dalam subnet termasuk network address (awal) dan broadcast address (akhir) yang tidak dapat assign ke host. Plan IP allocation dengan buffer untuk future growth: jangan allocate semua available address sekaligus. Document IP addressing scheme dengan clear notation untuk maintenance dan troubleshooting mudah.
p5: The calculator performs bitwise AND operations between the IP address and subnet mask to derive the network address. The broadcast address is computed by setting all host bits to 1. Usable host count is calculated as 2^(32-prefix length) - 2, subtracting the network and broadcast addresses. Binary representations show the distinction between network and host portions of the address. All four octets are validated to ensure they fall within the 0-255 range. The tool supports all valid CIDR prefix lengths from /0 to /32.
